players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob was investigated and is the mafioso. Watch him."
Diana: "Thanks Charlie, I'll keep an eye on Bob. Any suspects?"
You: "I'm innocent. Look into Charlie and Diana."
Charlie: "Bob confirmed as mafioso. Charlie and Diana, stay cautious."
Diana: "Will keep an eye on Bob. Thoughts, Charlie?"
You: "Staying quiet for now. Keep an eye on Charlie and Diana."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
